name: Hot Ones
bio: Hot Ones is a web series created by First We Feast, featuring celebrity interviews conducted while the guests eat increasingly spicy chicken wings.
The show is known for its unique format, engaging host (Sean Evans), and insightful conversations that emerge as guests struggle with the heat.
Hot Ones's content is characterized by its balance of humor, celebrity insights, and the physical challenge of eating progressively spicier wings.
The show has become a cultural phenomenon, attracting a large and dedicated audience who appreciate its unique blend of entertainment.
Hot Ones's audience consists primarily of viewers who enjoy celebrity interviews, food challenges, and internet culture.
lore: Hot Ones premiered in 2015 on the First We Feast YouTube channel.
The show quickly gained popularity for its unique format and the authentic reactions of its celebrity guests to the spicy wings.
Hot Ones has featured a wide range of celebrities, from actors and musicians to chefs and athletes.
The show has spawned numerous merchandise items, including hot sauces, shirts, and accessories.
Hot Ones has influenced the online interview landscape and has inspired many other creators to create their own unique interview formats.
